title: Champion of Hestia
name: Emphyrix - Champion of Hestia
printed_effect:
You can Disenchant {fire} from your Hestia in
order to add a 1 Spirit {fire} Elestral from your
Underworld to your hand. When you Ascend this
Emphyrix, during your End Phase you can
Special Cast it from your Underworld with {fire}.
effect: You can Disenchant {fire} from your Hestia in order to add a 1 Spirit {fire} Elestral from your Underworld to your hand. When you Ascend this Emphyrix, during your End Phase you can Special Cast it from your Underworld with {fire}.
